abstract: Margit Wennmachers, who co-founded the Silicon Valley public relations firm OutCast, will become a partner at Andreessen Horowitz, the venture capital firm.
snippet: Margit Wennmachers, who co-founded the Silicon Valley public relations firm OutCast, will become a partner at Andreessen Horowitz, the venture capital firm.
lead_paragraph: 1:50 p.m. | Updated  Added information about partners at Andreessen Horowitz and Google Ventures.

headline.main: Andreessen Horowitz Hires a Female Partner
